lender.name: John & Helen Green
lender.loan_because: What is a small amount of money to me can be a big help to those in other countries who are trying to get a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I (John) work for a school district, taking care of the phone system, radios and security systems. Helen is a school teacher.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference on a personal level

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I admire those around the world who are choosing to make life better through hard work and determination!
lender.occupational_info: Hard, long hours and worth every moment!

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I am called to be the hands and feet of Jesus here on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Grade 1 students in a Christian school and our school's theme this year is "God Change Us; Change Our World." Partnering with Kiva is only one of the many ways to help our brothers and sisters all over the world.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to empower people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: My work provides hope and opportunities to working families in my community. How great is that?!

lender.name: Rog√©rio
lender.loan_because: I lend to entrepreneurs. I want people to be able to build a better future for them and for their families.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards a PhD in Physics.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I think its important to help other people. Making a small contribution can have a tremendous effect on the lives of the people using these loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a full time law student. I will graduate in just over a year and hopefully find a job where I can continue to make a difference in other people's lives.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: Joe, Tina and Olivia gave me a birth gift certificate to Kiva. What a great idea from a great family.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Talk the talk, walk the walk. I see more than enough borrowers in Bangladesh. But I enjoy taking part on a personal and global level.
lender.occupational_info: We assist major microfinance companies like BRAC, Grameen Bank and ASA in improving their credit risk.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: My friends Joe, Tina& Olivia gave me a Kiva gift certificate for my birth day. Great idea from a great family.

lender.name: Steve Burri
lender.loan_because: my small contributions can make a big difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help creative people benefit from their ideas.

lender.name: sofibox
lender.loan_because: i believe in humanity

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: My parents were poor farmers and worked hard for their children. I felt that the entrpreneurs here have the same mind as my parents'
lender.occupational_info: I work for LG Electronics

lender.name: kenya
lender.occupational_info: I am working towards establishing social businesses and financial markets across Asia.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I teach math and science.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I volunteered for two years in South Africa and I want to keep giving something back.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math to students in Grade 7.

lender.name: Jibrail
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to raise money for business and family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychological-case-therapist at a residential home for the mentally ill. My work is to help improve the lives of the less fortunate.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I want to inpact the world and inspire others to do so as well.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.occupation: Student, Georgia Southern Univ., Class of 2012
lender.loan_because:
I want to help others who are struggling to survive, yet still have hope for a better future. I want to begin early in life having a tradition of sharing my advantages and good fortune while making meaningful contributions that change the lives of others.
I am fortunate that I have been able to recruit active team members to join the Georgia Southern University Alumni Team. However, this team is not just for alumni, and all are welcome to join and participate. Especially invited are the individuals and their families who are associated with Georgia Southern University. You will be very pleased and satisfied with your experience with helping the working poor.
lender.occupational_info:
Full time student, part time work in construction, short term projects, and Vice President of Felker Grant Racing.
I am inspired by these quotes, the first from the Team India Kiva Group:
"I must refuse to insult the naked by giving them clothes they do not need, instead of giving them work which they sorely need. I will not commit the sin of becoming their patron but, on learning that I had assisted in impoverishing them, I would give them neither crumbs nor cast off clothing, but the best of my food and clothes and associate myself with them in work." - Mahatma Gandhi
"When you feel discouraged or simply lazy, as is bound to happen sometimes, remember the millions of people in the world who have not had your privilege. Remember the poor and obscure lives of those countless millions who suffer from every sort of deprivation and frequently find themselves the unwilling victim of wars, and a variety of cruelties, perpetuated by man on man." - Jehan Sadat
"Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -Mark Twain

lender.name: Shilpa
lender.loan_because: I have some to share !

lender.name: jiang
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurial start-up capital is not enough
lender.occupational_info: My main job is through the network to provide gifts for the community service as a gift website, we provide the most favorable gifts to customers and thus get the pay due from the customer.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Today's entrepreneur represents the resourceful, creative and courageous human spirit. I feel strongly that supporting entrepreneurs as much as humanly possible, is a major factor in reducing global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a designer to develop products and systems that serve the life needs of people living in low income communities.

lender.name: Devin Bates
lender.loan_because: WWJD?
lender.occupational_info: School leadership

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: Small streams make big rivers

lender.name: Petra & Andreas
lender.loan_because: To help is joyfull and our human duty!
lender.occupational_info: Contract law and IT

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can.....

lender.name: Xandra
lender.loan_because: We are called by God to love the world and this is a tangible way that I can do that from where I live. The need is so great and we have so much!
lender.occupational_info: I give radiation treatments to people who have cancer to make them better.

lender.name: Michael & Lori
lender.loan_because:
"Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
"A bit of fragrance clings to the hand that gives flowers."
- Chinese Proverbs
lender.occupational_info: I help companies improve their business processes using technology.

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing is a great way to help fight poverty in a long-term perspective.

lender.name: Jim & Linda
lender.loan_because: Our family hopes that these microloans help give other families the chance to offer a better life for their children. From my family to yours, best wishes and good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I am a civilian employee of the US Department of Defense. I work in an investigative field.

lender.name: Gagan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Gabrielle
lender.loan_because: I FINALLY have a little extra money to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Hi, my name is Gabrielle. This is a picture of my daughter, Jack, and I. I work as a Customer Care Rep. In our spare time, Jack and I like to read, go to the park, and watch movies.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: kind people helped me start up, so paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Health and Wellness industry

lender.loan_because: INEED TO EXPAND MY BUSINESSES.
lender.occupational_info: I INVEST IN SMALL BUSINESS SUCH AS PRODUCE ,COMMUNICATION, LAND SELLING & BUYING ,RESTRUANTS AT ALOW LEVEL . MONEY LENDING IS MY NEXT STEP BUSINESS.

lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We are suppose to help people in this world. Having compassion feeds the heart with joy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an electrical contractor

lender.loan_because: I want to do something meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: I work in natural gas production.

lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.loan_because:
I've traveled to Uganda and Costa Rica and personally seen both the need and the difference micro-finance can make.
My son Alex is 8 and investing his pocket money in Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I find out how our customers want our software and websites to work and I then write down a specification explaining to software engineers what we need to build.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michel

lender.occupational_info: I translate materials from English into Brazilian Portuguese.

lender.loan_because: I love helping others

lender.name: Amandi
lender.loan_because: I have the zeal and intrest to go in to agriculture (animal rearing) .With this i will be able to also employ some unemployed youth to help reduce the unemployment rate of my country and community.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help ease the suffering of others, and loaning to entrepreneurs around the world can help break the poverty cycle.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Astronomy PhD student, and I study how giant planets (e.g. Jupiter & Saturn) formed. By extension, I am trying to understand how all extra-solar giant planets form.

lender.name: Sagegold Soaps
lender.loan_because: The older I get, the more I realize that I'm just a tiny cog in the grand scheme of things. The more we each work together, the better a place this world becomes for all of us.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Micro loans WORK!

lender.name: Ann
lender.occupational_info: I represent people with disabilities who are unable to work. I help them to obtain benefits so they can meet basic needs and live in dignity.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunity to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I find companies that do research and development and then help them get money back from the government.

lender.name: Johann
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I write hi-tech software that help trains stay on rails and in time

lender.name: charmaine
lender.loan_because: It was a gift from my sister-in-law and her husband. It is exciting to offer help to others in order achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help get people the appropriate compensation for their disabilities.

lender.name: Katy
lender.occupation: Assoc. Dir. of Admissions at Herzing University
lender.loan_because: I lend because I can. I try to support organizations that I truly believe in. Along with lending to Kiva, I regularly donate to Heifer International and Wisconsin Public Radio.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: its an easy way to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Cristian
lender.loan_because: In some small way I would like to help other entrepreneurs who are less fortunate or lack the resources to improve their businesses and lives.
lender.occupational_info: I design web sites for a living, and enjoy the daily process of creating and communicating online every single day.

lender.name: Kaisi
lender.loan_because: People should always be trying to help each other, even when they feel like they themselves need help. Eventually, everything comes back around.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I want to help those people that are willing to work but need a bit of financial help to get going. My background is in motorcycling so I respect those that work with motorcycles. This is reflected in my loans to workers in the Motorcycle Transport and Repair Industry. Good Luck to them.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a Police Motorcyclist but have now retired from the Police. I run a motorcycle training school, teaching people how to ride.

lender.name: Erwann
lender.loan_because: I want to reward entrepreneurship for the better good and I can do it! :-)

lender.name: Elise, Pam, Mel, Kim, Jess

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children to appreciate all the blessings we have in our lives, and about ways to help others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a homeschooling mom, which means I teach my own children at home, rather than sending them to school. I also help my husband with his business.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner, too, and I am passionate about helping other business owners -- especially women -- to grown their businesses, support their families and strengthen their communities
lender.occupational_info: I write, speak, teach and advise other business owners on how to win government contracts. And I've just written a book about it! www.governmentcontractsmadeeasier.com!

lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help others achieve their goals.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Jeffrey and Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading to 12 year-olds. My wife stays home with our children.

lender.name: Dannah
lender.loan_because: Just because I can. I love knowing that each small loan makes a big difference to the recipient. It's helps everyone make the world a better place.

lender.name: Class 5D
lender.loan_because: Our class had a bake sale to raise money. The students of 5D chose to give what they made to KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: We are an elementary school class in Hong Kong. We work very hard and we care about being global citizens.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Solidarity.

lender.loan_because: I feel blessed with the opportunities I have. It's time to provide an opportunity to another in a respectful way.
lender.occupational_info: problem solving and crunching numbers

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I edit business documents.

lender.name: Mardei
lender.loan_because: i want to invest in a small business, specifically, franchising a food cart business.
lender.occupational_info: in my work right now, in a small company, i earned just the minimum salary of an ordinary private employee. right now, it is ok for me. but thinking of the future, i know it would not be enough for me and to my family later. it is a good job anyway, but i think it would be better if i have my other source of income so that i can also prepare for the future.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want people to have opportunities to succeed.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: It feels great that I can help someone help themselves.

lender.name: David & Eriko

lender.occupational_info: Concert pianist (David) and concert violinist (Eriko) who teach at the Mannes College Of Music

lender.name: Colette
lender.loan_because: it's not a hand out - it's a hand up!
lender.occupational_info: I manage two offices where we help place people in jobs.

lender.name: Phi Sigma Pi - Sigma
lender.loan_because: we loan because our fraternity, the Sigma Chapter of Phi Sigma Pi National Honors Fraternity, has committed itself to serving the community both locally and globally.
lender.occupational_info: We are all full-time students at Millersville University in Pennsylvania USA, where we work hard for academic success, fellowship with others and giving back to our community.

lender.name: Mercedes
lender.loan_because: I was in the same situation 22 years ago. Being from Peru I know what it is like. Now being in the United States for more than 22 years I can finally help.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a caregiver. I own my own daycare center.

lender.name: Bitsy
lender.loan_because: individuals around the world helping other individuals around the world makes the world a smaller place.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: The only good in me is Jesus Christ. Because of His love for me, I want to love absolutely every person in the world, and Kiva is one very simple way to show that I care.

lender.loan_because: My grandaughter and I wanted to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and Taylor is in school.

lender.name: Adam

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: Having been in the Peace Corps, I have learned that small amounts of money can make great differences in peoples lives. Kiva enables motivated people to see these differences in their own lives..

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to be fairly successful now, but some people helped me along the way - and now it is my turn to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I work in local government trying to make a difference to other people.

lender.name: Duffy
lender.loan_because: We are all one...when I desire an experience, I cause another to experience it, and in so doing I do also...

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise high school students as they work on computers at school.

lender.name: Dan&Dana
lender.loan_because: ‚ÄúI expect to pass through life but once. If therefore, there be any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again.‚Äù ~William Penn

lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference... :)

lender.name: jill
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Lending rocks!

lender.name: Muriel
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in individual lives in less developed countries and help women raising children to be as fortunate as I am.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I love Jesus!

lender.name: Justine and Brandon
lender.loan_because: poverty is like the guest at your party that you didn't invite, and they're being annoying and obnoxious, and you're all like, "go away, please."

lender.occupational_info: Practical application of economic development

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I want to give those who need help the chance to suceed

lender.name: GivingTheFutureWay.org
lender.loan_because: As we all enjoy the spin around the Universe on this rock called Earth, let's all pass along good cheer!
lender.occupational_info: Mark@GivingTheFutureWay.org is connecting people through lending to alleviate poverty. Leveraging the Internet and a worldwide network of microfinance institutions, Kiva lets individuals just like you lend as little as $25 to help create opportunity around the world.

lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. So many people do not have the means necessary to survive. By engaging in microlending, I am doing my part in contributing to the success and happiness of others.

it's a good idea.
